title: Window Covering
description: cotton and rayon warp in stripes of white, gold, yellow tan and medium brown; weft of chenille and boucle in yellow-gold and gold metallic; handwoven, unlined; hardware and pleasts are intact; four pieced panels; pattern repeat at 9-1/2 in.  Commissioned for the Henry Neils House, Minneapolis MN, c.1950\'s
creditline: Gift of Henry and Frieda Neils
